forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 27. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 45. Northeast wind around 8 mph.

weather_report:
As the city breathes in the quiet of the night, Boston lies under a gentle veil of partly cloudy skies, the chill of early spring cradling the air. The current temperature hovers around a brisk 27 degrees, an invitation for warmth, as a delicate north wind whispers through the streets. With dawn on the horizon, a promise of a brighter day emerges; Wednesday will unveil itself mostly sunny, with the high creeping toward a comfortable 45. The clarity of the coming hours brings with it a refreshing vibrancy, a serene day for those who might venture outside.

Though the crispness of the atmosphere calls for layered attire—perhaps a sturdy sweater beneath a favorite coat—there's an exhilarating charm in the air. Perhaps consider a jaunt through one of Boston’s quiet parks or a leisurely stroll along the riverbank, where the trees stand sentinel against the backdrop of the awakening city. Adjust your routine to embrace the warmth of a steaming cup from a quaint café, allowing the morning to unfold at its own pace. Whether finding refuge in a book or sharing stories with friends, today carries the essence of possibility, wrapped in a comforting yet invigorating embrace.
